content.html: A person who has sex and gets pregnant and knows they can't or won't or doesn't want to take care of a child has the right to an abortion and the right to have no other person question their decision. The circumstances of that sex are irrelevant.
content.value:
A person who has sex and gets pregnant and knows they can't or won't or doesn't want to take care of a child has the right to an abortion and the right to have no other person question their decision. 

The circumstances of that sex are irrelevant.
